languages.text: "Поэтично сказано. Мне неизвестен никто с таким прозвищем, но... При слове "дирижер" я сразу думаю об Анатомической опере, а Тервантьяса Архимахинатора вполне можно назвать этим пышным титулом".

"How poetic. I don't know of anyone who goes by that moniker, although... when you said 'maestro,' I immediately thought of the Anatomical Opera. That fancy title sounds like it would fit Tervantias the Archmachinator."
languages.original_text: "Поэтично сказано. Мне неизвестен никто с таким прозвищем, но... При слове "дирижер" я сразу думаю об Анатомической опере, а Тервантьяса Архимахинатора вполне можно назвать этим пышным титулом".

traits.locale_text: "How poetic. I don't know of anyone who goes by that moniker, although... when you said 'maestro,' I immediately thought of the Anatomical Opera. That fancy title sounds like it would fit Tervantias the Archmachinator."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: “这可真是个充满诗意的名字。我不知道有谁会起这么个名字，不过……当你说到‘大师’这个词的时候，我立刻想到了解剖歌剧院。这个花哨的头衔，听起来很适合首席解体大师特万提亚斯。”
languages.original_text: "How poetic. I don't know of anyone who goes by that moniker, although... when you said 'maestro,' I immediately thought of the Anatomical Opera. That fancy title sounds like it would fit Tervantias the Archmachinator."

traits.locale_text: “这可真是个充满诗意的名字。我不知道有谁会起这么个名字，不过……当你说到‘大师’这个词的时候，我立刻想到了解剖歌剧院。这个花哨的头衔，听起来很适合首席阴谋大师特万提亚斯。”
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: 「ずいぶん詩的ですね。心当たりはありませんが…しかし、"音楽家"と聞いて真っ先にアナトミカル・オペラが頭に浮かびました。アーチマキネイター・テルヴァンティアスなら、その名に相応しいかと」
languages.original_text: "How poetic. I don't know of anyone who goes by that moniker, although... when you said 'maestro,' I immediately thought of the Anatomical Opera. That fancy title sounds like it would fit Tervantias the Archmachinator."

traits.locale_text: 「ずいぶん詩的ですね。心当たりはありませんが…しかし、"音楽家"と聞いて真っ先にアナトミカル・オペラが頭に浮かびました。アーチマキネイター・テルヴァンティアスなら、その名に相応しいかと」
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: «Qué poético. No conozco a nadie que se haga llamar por ese título, pero... cuando has dicho "maestro", me ha venido a la mente la Ópera Anatómica. Un título como ese podría pertenecer a Tervantias el Archimaquinador».
languages.original_text: "How poetic. I don't know of anyone who goes by that moniker, although... when you said 'maestro,' I immediately thought of the Anatomical Opera. That fancy title sounds like it would fit Tervantias the Archmachinator."

traits.locale_text: «Qué poético. No conozco a nadie que se haga llamar por ese título, pero... cuando has dicho "maestro", me ha venido a la mente la Ópera Anatómica. Un título como ese podría pertenecer a Tervantias el Archimaquinator».
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.original_text: "How poetic. I don't know of anyone who goes by that moniker, although... when you said 'maestro,' I immediately thought of the Anatomical Opera. That fancy title sounds like it would fit Tervantias the Archmachinator."

languages.text: « Comme c'est poétique ! Je ne connais personne qui se fait appeler ainsi, mais... le terme de "maestro" me fait tout de suite penser à l'Opéra anatomique. Un sobriquet pareil irait parfaitement à Tervantias l'Archimachinateur. »
languages.original_text: "How poetic. I don't know of anyone who goes by that moniker, although... when you said 'maestro,' I immediately thought of the Anatomical Opera. That fancy title sounds like it would fit Tervantias the Archmachinator."

traits.locale_text: « Comme c'est poétique ! Je ne connais personne qui se fait appeler ainsi, mais... le terme de "maestro" me fait tout de suite penser à l'Opéra anatomique. Un sobriquet pareil irait parfaitement à Tervantias l'Archimachinateur. »
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Sehr poetisch. Allerdings kenne ich niemanden dieses Namens ... als Ihr 'Maestro' sagtet, dacht eich sofort an die Anatomische Oper. Der Titel könnte zu Tervantias dem Erzmachinator passen."
languages.original_text: "How poetic. I don't know of anyone who goes by that moniker, although... when you said 'maestro,' I immediately thought of the Anatomical Opera. That fancy title sounds like it would fit Tervantias the Archmachinator."

traits.locale_text: "Sehr poetisch. Allerdings kenne ich niemanden dieses Namens ... als Ihr 'Maestro' sagtet, dacht eich sofort an die Anatomische Oper. Der Titel könnte zu Tervantias dem Erzmachinator passen."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Ne kadar da şairaneymiş. Bu lakapla bilinen birini tanımıyorum ama 'maestro' dediğinde aklıma direkt Anatomi Operası geldi. Bu gösterişli sıfat da tam Başmakinatör Tervantias'a yakışacak cinsten."
languages.original_text: "How poetic. I don't know of anyone who goes by that moniker, although... when you said 'maestro,' I immediately thought of the Anatomical Opera. That fancy title sounds like it would fit Tervantias the Archmachinator."

traits.locale_text: "Ne kadar da şairaneymiş. Bu lakapla bilinen birini tanımıyorum ama 'maestro' dediğinde aklıma direkt Anatomi Operası geldi. O gösterişli sıfat da tam Başmakinatör Tervantias'a yakışacak cinsten."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True
